Privacy Policy

We collect limited data to operate our services (e.g., logs, contact form details).

What we collect

  • Contact info you submit (name, email, phone)
  • Technical telemetry (pages, performance, errors)

How we use it

To provide features, improve reliability, and communicate about demos or support.

Sharing

We don’t sell personal data. Trusted processors may assist with hosting/analytics under contract.

Security

Reasonable safeguards are used, but no system is 100% secure.

Your choices

Email us to access, correct, or delete your data.
